short.am,ar,bg,bn,ca,cs,da,de,el,en,en_AU,en_G: Scouts your opposing team players for Prime League matches fast and easy.

long.am,ar,bg,bn,ca,cs,da,de,el,en,en_AU,en_G: Easily scout players on your opposing Prime League team by pressing a single button. The current version uses op.gg to lookup player stats and match histories.
